column3: College of Arts, Humanities and Business
column5: The course is fully accredited by the Chartered Banker Institute. This means you will graduate with a dual award: an MSc Banking and Finance and the Chartered Banker Diploma, which is the gold standard for professional bankers and is the highest award available in the banking world. We are proud to be in a select group of business schools to offer this dual
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
